name: Sweet Dreams Bear
description:
(Make sure you have flash enabled on your browser, or the game may not show up above!)

My submission for the Ludum Dare 31! The theme was "Entire Game On One Screen". The game was made in 72 hours.

This was my first jam and I had a blast! Hope you have fun with the game. :)

A sweet game where you play as a mother bear tucking her son in at night. Sometimes it's not so easy to let him sleep soundly in his own bed, but a story or two might help!
